de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im

Class ImcAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im.ImcAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, ImAdapter<ImcConnectionAdapter>, ImcAdapter

     class ImcAdapterIetf
extends Object
implements ImcAdapter
    IMC adapter adapting an IMC according to IETF/TCG specifications.
